tool.name: Exact-Tandems

param.name: minmatch
param.label: Minimum match length for the tandems

tool.help: This script finds exact tandem repeats in a specified FastA sequence file. It is a post-processor for repeat-match and provides a simple interface and output for tandem repeat detection.
